attributes.action: Delete the Welsh language as an option for electronic Vehicle road fund licensing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are supposed to be a United 
Kingdom.

How many people are there who only speak Welsh?

Why encourage separatism by having language options to suit a very small but vociferous minority?

Are we going down the road to Cornish ?, Gaelic ? What about Yam, Yam and Agie Pagie ?

This is divisive, expensive and offensive to people who value the Union

The majotiy, I suspect.

I telephoned the DVLC to ask who I could discuss this issue with and was 
given a tirade of abuse by the female Welsh operative.
